snippet.title: The Fridge is Red - Official Announcement & NEW Demo
snippet.description:
Play the NEW Demo and Wishlist on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1532460/

Spiral down the psychological horror episodes.
Experience the unsettling liminal spaces and surreal events inspired by analogue horror of the PSX era.
What is inside the Red Fridge? Try to find out in the new DEMO.

Join the community on Discord:
https://discord.gg/xHu2yjdYP2

Follow the game:
https://twitter.com/TheFridgeisRed
https://www.facebook.com/TheFridgeisRed/
